page.title: 07Fund raising events.
page.content: Annual events held in the parish of Kirk Bramwith:_ March_Snowdrop Festival a church fund raiser held when churchyard is carpeted with snowdrops,morning coffee, afternoon tea served Thursday and Saturday,craft stalls,festival service on Sunday.Barn Dance held in June at Bramwith Hall organised by local Hospital Comforts Committee,live cabaret by committee members, dancing and supper,very popular event,great money raiser.A new event for 1985 a Charity Market held on village green 13th July to raise money for Doncaster Hospice Appeal to help cancer sufferers and their families.Various other fund raising events take place in peoples houses e.g. coffee mornings,garden parties, wine and cheese evenings.
